title: Allegorical Truths of Immortality
body: Join Jonny Enoch in this Mystery Teachings Special series as he traces the esoteric secrets that connect our fragile future to our immortal past. How is it possible the eight kings of Sumer lived over an average of 30,000 years each? Can the parallels between the Biblical and Sumerian creation stories provide context to humanity regarding the mysteries of our ancient origins, and how to realize our latent potential to unlock a better future? Enoch explores these innate connections between arcane teachings, religious texts, ancient tablets and mythical legends to uncover allegorical truths that could help humanity understand our origins.
teaser: How is it possible the eight kings of Sumer lived over an average of 30,000 years each? Join Jonny Enoch in this Mystery Teachings Special series as he traces the esoteric secrets that connect our fragile future to our immortal past.

title: Ever-Burning Lamps of Ancient Times
body: Are there ancient technologies that have yet to be understood? Jonny Enoch shares his research into the esoteric mystery of “ever-burning lamps" from across history to explore the meaning, purpose and the detailed accounts of their origins and recoveries. Enoch sees a pattern of ever-burning lamps being associated with sacred places, religious rights, and initiates of the mystery schools. From tombs in Egypt to Pagan sites in Ireland, from temples in Tibet to the far reaches of our planet, history is littered with stories of lamps that burn for hundreds, if not thousands of years. There are many correlating points of data connecting cultures and civilizations from different eras and locations throughout time to these alchemically advanced light sources.
teaser: Jonny Enoch shares his research into the esoteric mystery of “ever-burning lamps" from across history to explore the meaning, purpose and the detailed accounts of their origins and recoveries.

title: Cyclical Experiences of Souls
body: Could new scientific studies and empirical data prove the reality of our past lives? Esoteric researcher Jonny Enoch connects real world experiences, history, science, and the religions of the world to explore the mysteries of reincarnation, past lives, and the wheel of samsara. From child prodigies to epigenetics, Enoch cites studies finding that the phenomenon of individuals remembering past lives is far more widespread than originally thought. Thousands around the globe have remembered specific memories of their past lives, and even the details of their deaths. Learn more about the secrets of our souls through first-hand accounts of the beyond.
teaser: Esoteric researcher Jonny Enoch connects real world experiences, history, science, and the religions of the world to explore the mysteries of reincarnation, past lives, and the wheel of samsara.

title: Lemuria, Mu, Atlantis, & Egypt
body:
Is it possible Egypt was seeded by the Atlantean civilization to preserve their legacy? Join esoteric researcher Jonny Enoch as he digs into epochs past, and why stories of sunken cities are vital to our understanding of history and what we inherited from the ancients.

Exploring humanity’s hidden history from Pangea to the present, Enoch explains how cyclical cataclysms, fact-based geology, and ancient texts correlate with old and new research on the lost civilization of Lemuria to paint a new picture of our origins.
teaser: Join esoteric researcher Jonny Enoch as he digs into epochs past, and why stories of sunken cities are vital to our understanding of history and what we inherited from the ancients.

title: Astrotheology & Origins of the Zodiac
body:
If astrotheology and astrology evolved into astronomy, what are the shared perspectives between ancient civilizations and the Zodiac? Esoteric researcher Jonny Enoch proposes that spirituality and modern science need to unite in order to give humanity a clear picture of our origins and our connections to the stars. 

Many aspects of human civilizations throughout millennia have been influenced by the constellations — from the days of the week to legendary religious scripts — different cultures worldwide share correlations tying into the ages of the Zodiac.
teaser: If astrotheology and astrology evolved into astronomy, what are the shared perspectives between ancient civilizations and the Zodiac? Esoteric researcher Jonny Enoch proposes that spirituality and modern science need to unite in order to give humanity a clear picture of our origins and our connections to the stars.

title: Linking Symbology Through Time
body:
There are many correlating mystical symbols around the globe; from Egypt to Greece, East to West. Esoteric researcher Jonny Enoch explains the connections between these ancient civilizations and their linking symbology. 

Exploring serpent worship, recurring symbolism and much more, Enoch encourages mankind to read between the lines of ancient history to better learn from these lost messages. These hidden truths and secret languages could unlock a deeper understanding and result in a more successful future for humanity.
teaser: There are many correlating mystical symbols around the globe; from Egypt to Greece, East to West. Esoteric researcher Jonny Enoch explains the connections between these ancient civilizations and their linking symbology.

title: The Quantum Quilt of Reality
body:
Throughout history various figures have claimed to be able to access a quantum field of information, such as Nikola Tesla, Rudolf Steiner, Walter Russell, Edgar Cayce, and Srinivasa Ramanujan. Esoteric researcher Jonny Enoch provides evidence for consciousness working as a quantum field, not a phenomenon limited to within the brain. 

From information delivered in dreams to the Akashic Records and quantum physics of today, there have been numerous inventions and simultaneous discoveries, tying back to Isaac Newton and other figures throughout history. Pythagoras called this the Monad. In science, it’s called the Unified Field, and over the ages, spiritual peoples of various lineages refer to this core of consciousness as the source, the Great Spirit, or God.
teaser: Throughout history various figures have claimed to be able to access a quantum field of information, such as Nikola Tesla, Rudolf Steiner, Walter Russell, Edgar Cayce, and Srinivasa Ramanujan. Esoteric researcher Jonny Enoch provides evidence for consciousness working as a quantum field, not a phenomenon limited to within the brain.

title: Mystical Mathematics of Pythagoras
body:
Pythagoras is a legendary figure cast throughout history for much more than mathematics, but how much of his story has history omitted? Esoteric researcher Jonny Enoch traces the multifarious journeys of Pythagoras to illustrate he was much more of a “Mathe-Magician” than simply a mathematician. 

A student of mystery schools across the world, Pythagoras was also a philosopher, an herbalist, a teacher, an astronomer, a Magi of Babylon, and a martyr. Delve into the often-untold and misunderstood history of Pythagoras, exploring his travels and education to paint a more vivid and honest picture of the legendary thinker.
teaser: Pythagoras is a legendary figure cast throughout history for much more than mathematics, but how much of his story has history omitted? Esoteric researcher Jonny Enoch traces the multifarious journeys of Pythagoras to illustrate he was much more of a “Mathe-Magician” than simply a mathematician.

title: Mysteries of Solar Symbolism
body:
The very fabric of our modern civilization is encoded with countless examples of solar worship. The sun played a vital role in almost every major religion and sacred tradition throughout human history, tying epochs and beliefs of the past to the present.

Noting the sun's alignment with different ancient structures and temples, esoteric researcher Jonny Enoch explains how humanity remains tied to these ancient traditions through words such as “hours” and “amen” which relate back to Horus and Amun-Ra. Stretching across time from ancient Egypt and the origins of humanity, to mystery schools of the Renaissance and later eras, solar traditions and clues left behind connect many civilizations and beliefs.
teaser: Esoteric researcher Jonny Enoch explores how the very fabric of our modern civilization is encoded with countless examples of solar worship
